title: Luffy's Conqueror's Haki Foreshadows Future Mastery
description: Luffy unconsciously uses Conqueror's Haki while severely poisoned, demonstrating that this rare ability is deeply ingrained in him even when he's barely conscious.
significance: This moment foreshadows Luffy's eventual mastery of Conqueror's Haki, which becomes crucial in later arcs including his advanced applications during Wano.

title: Ivankov's Revolutionary Army Connection
description: Emporio Ivankov is introduced as a Revolutionary Army commander, setting up his importance to the larger One Piece world and his connection to Luffy's father Dragon.
significance: Foreshadows the Revolutionary Army's growing importance in the story and hints at future revelations about Luffy's family connections.

title: Level 5.5 as Prison Break Base
description: The discovery of Level 5.5 with its secret passageways to every level above establishes the base and infrastructure needed for the upcoming mass prison break.
significance: Sets up the logistics and safe haven that will enable the historic Impel Down breakout.

title: Inazuma's Devil Fruit Utility
description: Inazuma's introduction and presence in New Kama Land hints at their Devil Fruit ability (Choki Choki no Mi) which will prove crucial for the prison break.
significance: Foreshadows Inazuma's critical role in helping Luffy and others escape from Impel Down using their scissors ability.
